Game.Name: Spyro Advance - Wakuwaku Tomodachi Daisakusen! (Japan)
Game.plot: In Crash Bandicoot Purple: Ripto's Rampage and Spyro Orange: The Cortex Conspiracy, Dr. Neo Cortex--Crash's nemesis--and Ripto--Spyro's nemesis--have accidentally met up through underground portals and are set on taking over the entire universe. Crash and Spyro must team up with each other to discover the identity of the new menace and save the universe from this evil plot. In these side-scrolling adventures, you can link up with three friends for a variety of multiplayer modes, including Party Games, Wager Games, and Card Trading. Connecting both Crash Bandicoot Purple and Spyro Orange gives you the option of unlocking special content and allows you to trade and wager the cards with friends.Cheat: Fun PasswordsAt the game mode screen, press the L and R buttons together to activate the code entry screen.Cheat: Various UnlockablesNOTE: The unlockable levels will pop up when you get close to their location.
